"News" (ID 3) is the direct object (dobj) of "outbreak," suggesting that the outbreak is the source of the news. This structure emphasizes that the sentence is about news concerning a disease outbreak, specifically referring to the Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) in the United Arab Emirates.

In the provided CoNLL-U format, "WHO" (World Health Organization) is identified as a proper noun (PROPN) with the ID 6. This structure highlights that the news about the disease outbreak originates from the WHO.
